events.message: I received my laptop yesterday but noticed the screen has several scratches and the keyboard is not working properly. This is very disappointing as I expected a perfect product.
The issue has been categorized by the system as a Product Defect based on the customer’s description of scratches and malfunction.
An agent specializing in product defects has been assigned to handle the case regarding the damaged laptop and keyboard.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the issues with your laptop. I’ll do my best to assist you in resolving this promptly.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches on the screen and the malfunctioning keyboard, as well as your order number for verification?
I have attached clear pictures showing the scratched screen and the keys that are not responding. My order number is 123456789. Please advise on next steps.
Thank you for the information. We can offer you a replacement unit shipped within 3 business days or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know your choice.
I would prefer a replacement. Thank you for the prompt assistance and clear options provided.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be dispatched shortly. We appreciate your patience and apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Just checking in to ensure your replacement laptop arrived in good condition and is working properly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
